channel.title: Server help
channel.description: hey guys everytime i download any server i make sure i check the compile and try to compile but it usually says cant find error also it says i cant do it because i need jdk 5.0 or 6.0 but i have jdk 7.0 plus when i try to run the sever and its open and close really fast saying it cant find the java path i really need some help ty

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @iownedyouhard iownedyouhard
item.description:
@iownedyouhard wrote:

check your jdk version by going to C:\Program Files\Java\ find your jdk open it…there must be a bin there
right click then click properties copy the C:\Program Files\Java\jdk.1.7.0
then go to your compiler you should see

@echo @title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause exit
replace the "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01" with your version of JAVA [size=12pt][b]THIS IS FOR COMPILER THX[/b][/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @dragon_nax dragon nax
item.description:
@dragon_nax wrote:

compile says

javac: file not found: src\server\event*.java
usage: javac
use -help for a list of posible options
press any key to continue. . .

the run says

error: could not find or load main class server.server
press any key to continue. . .

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Artesia, post:5, topic:421290”]Compiler

@echo off
"C:\Program files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java
pause

Run

@echo off title Server "C:\Program files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause [/quote]
Now try

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Artesia Artesia
item.description:
@Artesia wrote:

Compiler

@echo off
"C:\Program files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27/bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java
pause

Run

@echo off
title Server
"C:\Program files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1300m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

Right click the compiler and it will say something like “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe”
If your on a laptop replace that code with this "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe"
If your on a WINDOWS 7 desktop replace it with this "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe"

Read full topic
